description: Enterprise techniques used by Nerex, ATT&CK software S0210 v1.0
name: Nerex (S0210)

techniques.comment: [Nerex](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0210) creates a Registry subkey that registers a new service.(Citation: Symantec Nerex May 2012)
[Nerex](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0210) creates a backdoor through which remote attackers can download files onto a compromised host.(Citation: Symantec Ristol May 2012)
[Nerex](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0210) creates a Registry subkey that registers a new service.(Citation: Symantec Nerex May 2012)
[Nerex](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0210) drops a signed Microsoft DLL to disk.(Citation: Symantec Nerex May 2012)
